class.name: SemiVarianceTest

method.name: testSample
method.comment: Verify that upper + lower semivariance against the mean sum to variance

method.name: testNonMeanCutoffs
method.comment: Turn off bias correction - use df = length

javadoc.text: Check that the lower + upper semivariance against the mean sum to the * variance.
Check that upper and lower semivariances against a cutoff sum to the sum * of squared deviations of the full set of values against the cutoff * divided by df = length - 1 (assuming bias-corrected).
